thread.title: Architectural Digest: 11 Bridges With Unbelievable Waterfall Views
thread.title_full: Architectural Digest: 11 Bridges With Unbelievable Waterfall Views

author: Architectural Digest
title: Architectural Digest: 11 Bridges With Unbelievable Waterfall Views
text:
By Nick Mafi for Architectural Digest . 
(photo: Imagebroker/Alamy 
Waterfalls are among nature's most spectacular sights. Architectural Digest rounds up 11 bridges across the globe that bring us closer to the action. Above, a footbridge snakes toward Iguazu Falls, on the border of Brazil and Argentina. 
(photo: Simon Phelps Photography/Getty Images) 
Victoria Falls Bridge, Victoria Falls, on the border of Zambia and Zimbabwe. 
(photo: Win-Initiative/Getty Images) 
Footbridge near the base of LÃ¥tefossen Waterfalls, Latefossen, Norway. 
(photo: Aflo Co. Ltd./Alamy) 
Footbridge overlooking a waterfall in Otari Village, Nagano, Japan. 
(photo: Ian Dagnall/Alamy)
